entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:04 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:04 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
